think_procedure: The description of the knob 'min_wal_size' does not mention any special values that would change the function of the knob drastically. It seems to be a regular numerical knob where the value set determines the disk usage for WAL files. The knob can be set in megabytes and the default is 80 MB. There is no mention of a value like -1 or 0 that would disable a feature or change the function of the knob.
